name: Space Survivor Hero
description:
Fight horde of cruel monsters from different worlds with the power of your reflexes and strategies! With our leveling system and stats customization, each player will have their own and unique spaceship, whether its being stronger, faster or be more resistant, everything is customizable for your own taste. Play through the campaign to level up, drop some gears or try our endless monster wave challenge! The game is playable for everyone, to the new player playing casually or the expert that are hungry for challenge.

SPECIAL FEATURES:
• 4 different worlds with unique monsters and epic final bosses!
• Lot of gears to drop from stage or buy from the shop!
• Lot of skins for your spaceship!
• Level up your Spaceship with an RPG-like customizable stats!
• Endless monster wave challenge!

As a team of 2 beginner in the immense world of game development, we sincerely hope that you will like your experience with our very first game and we can’t wait to have your opinion/suggestion on it!

CONTROLS
Turret : A, S, D, K, L
Power up : Space bar

NOTE
This game is playable in the browser but it's optimized for mobile. For example, the background video is not working in the browser.
